content: Use active voice, present tense; keep sentences short
Consistent terminology; define acronyms on first use
Show request and response with minimal, realistic examples
Always include auth, rate limits, errors, and pagination sections
Prefer curl + language tabs (TS, Python, Go, Java, Kotlin, Swift, Rust)
Use lowercase kebab-case for REST paths; nouns for resources
Cross-link related guides and concepts; avoid dead ends
